column5: I will as soon as I get my auger running.Ileft the old gas in it from last year.Ooooops.
ok I got a pic under my handle,now what.To post pictures and such.
now you take the link from photobucket and place it in your post it needs tags or put the link in the photo box above the text area http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/style_i...mage-button.png

The URL that you paste from photobucket should look like this:  [ IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v203/greencoachdog/DSC01933.jpg[/img ]  I threw in a couple of extra spaces so it wouldn't be a pic. Paste it to a line by itself like I did here!
I will give photobucket a shot.I doing photos one at a time.
If you're going to upload pics to photobucket, use the bulk uploader... it's faster and easier!

I am not very good at adding photos or even sending them.I have in the past but just out of luck.Do i need to put OFC on my fav list?Is there a program that most of you like to use such as photobucket?I would love to show some pics but I am kinda new is this field of tech.I learn as I go.Any help would be great and mostly appreciated.thanks all
Follow the instructions.  I have my own avatar.
like mine (below this text)?

Photobucket really works for me Vinni, when posting an avatar pic use the direct link.  If you should decide to get a photobucket account, use the bulk uploader... it's much easier to upload a bunch of pics at one time.

yeah sign up to photobucket upload photos copy the link then come back to the board and go to my controls  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...rCP&CODE=00 go to ...Edit Avatar Settings  ..and put in link in ....Enter a URL to an online avatar image
Thats why you have kids...to make it look like you know what your doing   Vinnni ...give your kids a couple of bucks and have them do it for ya
That's what we call and avatar pic Vinni.. the one on the bottom is a signature pic.
... is that why you can't post those fish pics.. because your kids are too busy doing other stuff?
if you read the fine print in my "signature" you can also see another site to make a signature.  use photobucket for everything else.
